title: Client stuck on "your account has been transferred to a different region"
body: I transferred my account back to OCE after moving countries. I now cannot log in to the client at all as it's stuck saying "your account has been transferred to a different region". I know that it has, I just had to pay for it which is ridiculous enough... but now I can't use it at all. How can I get passed this and actually log in?

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support: https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Boards just aren't equipped to help with things like account transfers I'm afraid. Best of luck!
